trans-unit.source: Use the <codeph>runtimeinfo</codeph> command or the <codeph>getRuntimeInfo</codeph> method to get memory usage and current session information about the Network Server, including user, database, and prepared statement information.

trans-unit.source: The <codeph>getRuntimeInfo</codeph> method returns the same information as the <codeph>runtimeinfo</codeph> command. The signature for the <codeph>getRuntimeInfo</codeph> method is
